title: How many pages are 40,000 words in a book? - Quora

response.answer_text: A 40,000 word count will create about 80 pages single-spaced or 160 pages double-spaced with normal margins (1″) using 12 pt. Times New Roman or Arial font. Your mileage may vary of course depending on what font you use, whether you use multiple spaces after a period, and your paragraph spacing settings. Documents that typically contain 40,000 or more words include short novels and extensive dissertations/theses. Use our online word count tool to quickly count how many words are in your blog post, article, or essay.

Roughly 160 if you use the standard of 12pt Ariel or Times New Roman font, double spaced, 1 inch margins. Word has a word/page count option and so does many other writing programs including Google Docs. Use the tools available to you, like the rest of us do.
